typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SKLoja as integer,
		CodigoLoja as integer,
		NomeLoja as string,
		EnderecoLoja as string,
		StatusLoja as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> FlowDimLoja
FlowDimLoja keyGenerate(output({undefined} as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
